name: GOES-16-L2-CMI
title: GOES-16 Cloud & Moisture Imagery
description: GOES-16 Advanced Baseline Imager (ABI) L2 Cloud and Moisture Imagery provides 16 spectral bands at high temporal resolution over the American Continent. (...)

bands.name: ABI Band 1
bands.description: Daytime aerosol over land, coastal water mapping

bands.name: ABI Band 3
bands.description: Daytime vegetation, burn scar, aerosol over water, winds

bands.name: ABI Band 5
bands.description: Daytime cloud-top phase and particle size, snow

bands.name: ABI Band 6
bands.description: Daytime land, cloud properties, particle size, vegetation, snow

bands.name: ABI Band 7
bands.description: Surface and cloud, fog at night, fire, winds

bands.name: ABI Band 8
bands.description: High-level atmospheric water vapor, winds, rainfall

bands.name: ABI Band 9
bands.description: Midlevel atmospheric water vapor, winds, rainfall

bands.name: ABI Band 10
bands.description: Lower-level water vapor, winds, and silicon dioxide

bands.name: ABI Band 11
bands.description: Total water for stability, cloud phase, dust, silicon dioxide, rainfall

bands.name: ABI Band 14
bands.description: Imagery, sea surface temperature, clouds, rainfall

bands.name: ABI Band 15
bands.description: Total water, volcanic ash, sea surface temperature
